title: 820-2936-b green light, normal rotation, u7000 ? with hole and PPbus_g3h 12,26v
message: Hello friend, this board had the u7000 with a hole, I changed it and checked the resistors around, the voltages shown are: PPbus_g3h 12.26v, PP5v_s0 5.0v, PP3v42_g3h 3.49v, SMC_BATLOW_L 3,26v, SMC_ADAPTER_EN 3.47v, ALL_SYS_27 v, SMC_PM_G2_EN 3.49v. I hope these tensions make it easier to understand the problem

title: 820-2936-b green light, normal rotation, u7000 ? with hole and PPbus_g3h 12,26v
message: Post voltage and diode mode to ground on SCL/SDA lines of battery bus; charger removed, for diode mode!

title: 820-2936-b green light, normal rotation, u7000 ? with hole and PPbus_g3h 12,26v
message: SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA  2.318V  and  SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SCL  2.320V  for diode mode.

title: 820-2936-b green light, normal rotation, u7000 ? with hole and PPbus_g3h 12,26v
message:
I'm npt sure what you've posted there.
For diode mode, you should get OL measuring with black probe at ground; aprox 0.450-550 with red probe to ground.
And voltage should be aprox 3.3V on both lines...

title: 820-2936-b green light, normal rotation, u7000 ? with hole and PPbus_g3h 12,26v
message:
SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA 0.526v 
SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SCL 0.546v para o modo diodo.

title: 820-2936-b green light, normal rotation, u7000 ? with hole and PPbus_g3h 12,26v
message:
There is a big diference; less than 0.5% usual.
I hope J6955 was disconnected.
Remove D6950 and check again.

"And voltage should be aprox 3.3V on both lines..."
???

title: 820-2936-b green light, normal rotation, u7000 ? with hole and PPbus_g3h 12,26v
message: resolved, replaces the board because the customer is accelerating.
